data.headline: DOWNASDAQS&P 500RUSSELL 2000DOW - Stock Price Chart
bullets: S&P 500 rises 0.3–0.9% and Nasdaq gains 0.4–1% as tech stocks rebound, while Dow and Russell remain roughly flat to +0.2%

Nvidia leads a broad semiconductor and software rally, with Cadence Design (CDNS) up 7%, Synopsys (SNPS) up 3%, Micron (MU) up 5.9%, and Palantir (PLTR) higher; Palo Alto Networks (PANW) trades softer
Meta’s expanded AI partnership boosts sentiment across the tech sector
AI selloff fears ease, fueling renewed flows into tech and semiconductors
January FOMC minutes reveal a policy divide on rate cuts, discussion of possible hikes if inflation persists, and concerns over rich valuations and AI vulnerabilities
Treasury yields see only mild selling and hover near multi-week lows despite hawkish Fed minutes
The dollar remains firm, gold holds near recent highs, and copper climbs as traders monitor inflation risks and sector rotation
Geopolitical headlines, especially from Iran, and upcoming PCE inflation data remain in focus for traders
